Reviews.Title: do not buy
Reviews.Author: Kathleen R Cherico
Reviews.Content: Phone was sold to me as new . I COMPLAINED MANY TIMES WITH NO AVAIL. It was not new and broke soon after purchase.

Reviews.Title: Old phone, doesn't comply with all current Verizon services
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: Okay, just for calls.  You may have to change your data plan.  Doesn't support all Verizon services such as contact updates.

Reviews.Title: Cheap but very limited use
Reviews.Author: J. Petty
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone as a cheap replacement for a phone that I drowned when boating.  It was advertised as having all the features of the phone I ruined and I have had good luck with LG phones in the past.  All of the features are there but they do not all work.  There is a camera but this phone will not receive or send photos in text messages.  It will not access the internet either and has lousy reception.  Some of the problems may be due to Verison not supporting this phone anymore, but I am disappointed with it, as I was led to believe these features worked.

Reviews.Title: This phone only lasted about four months
Reviews.Author: r.w.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone about four months ago and the problem with the phone isThat when I talk the person can't hear me also the "ok" button on phone stop working.If that's not enough LG does not want to accept their 1 year warranty because they stop selling this item already.

Reviews.Title: not satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: tpluv12
Reviews.Content: I got this order within good time. When I received the phone, I charged it completly and switched my number to the device. The phone then worked for one day and went dead. Not sure if it's the battery or what but I will never order a used phone first of all and I would not order from this seller again.

Reviews.Title: Not good
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: Had these phones for years and the hinges always break.  This was a flip phone for an elderly relative and it broke within a month.  Lg phones are good, just not the housing on this one.

Reviews.Title: replacement phone
Reviews.Author: Kristina L. Beall
Reviews.Content: Nice phone. My husband already had one like this but put it through the washer. Hard to find just a basic phone anymore. Was exactly what they said and the exact same thing as when we bought it new from Verizon about 3 or years ago. Best part no new contract with Verizon.

Reviews.Title: I got more tha I paid for, excellent service from seller.
Reviews.Author: shilox
Reviews.Content: This phone fit my needs. All I needed was a quality phone that did not drop calls and I could hear the recipient and they could hear me. Excellent service from seller! I received the phone much earlier than expected. Clean well preserved phone. Price was right. I see people who leave negitive feed back because one has to manually put in numbers, if they want a phone that does it all they should go pay a couple hundred and get locked into a contract. This phone was exactly as stated. If you just need a phone this VG8350 is perfect for that. The only thing I did not care for is the poor ring tones that come with it.

Reviews.Title: im gonna miss this phone
Reviews.Author: Jorge
Reviews.Content: i got this phone 2 years ago, i love it, its so easy to text i dont even have to look at the screen cuz i have the keys memorized so i can text and walk at the same time without looking at my phone. the camera isnt the best. though i only text and dont need pics. and call quality just as good as any phone ive ever used. but yesterday the screen turned to static but im not shocked, ive dropped this phone in the floor so many times i lost count, not one scracth, so i just ordered a new used phone to replace it by the mean time the vx 10000, time to upgrade a bit now

Reviews.Title: Fast Shipping
Reviews.Author: MJB45805
Reviews.Content: I was happy to find this phone to replace one just like it for my 84 yr. old Mother. I was ddreading having to teach her a new one.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: mary missildine
Reviews.Content: I had a phone exactly like this one, but I got it wet and it wouldn't work anymore. So I wanted another one. This one is used, but just like new. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Good Seller
Reviews.Author: jessmr2
Reviews.Content: The seller was fantastic.  This is my favorite Stupid phone.  Pictures are not gerat but it does its job.  Makes phone calls and text.  All I need.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price!
Reviews.Author: B. Osborne
Reviews.Content: This little phone actually does quite a bit for how inexpensive it is.  I was surprised at how long the battery lasts, too.  Verizon's network has always seemed solid, and I never had any dropped calls with this phone, either.  Would recommend!

ProductInfo.Features:
This product has been carefully audited and is certified to be 100% functional.
This offer includes the following accessories 1. Battery 2. Battery Cover (if applicable) 3. Wall Charger
ProductInfo.Name: LG VX8350 MP3 Red - Verizon or PagePlus
